text: Hey folks, I just started to use Pluto and it is a great experience so far :slightly_smiling_face:. I just had a question about debugging. Is it possible to add breakpoints in a cell? Like if I were running Debugger.jl, I would add the `@bp` macro and then it would drop to the command line in the cell. I am not sure if something like that is possible in Pluto yet, but I figured I would ask. Thanks.

elements.text: Hey folks, I just started to use Pluto and it is a great experience so far
. I just had a question about debugging. Is it possible to add breakpoints in a cell? Like if I were running Debugger.jl, I would add the
macro and then it would drop to the command line in the cell. I am not sure if something like that is possible in Pluto yet, but I figured I would ask. Thanks.

text:
No breakpoints yet, but we are working on logging.
This interface is still WIP: <https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/pull/437> but you can already view log messages (`@info` , `@warn` , etc) by opening the javascript console of your browser: <https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/pull/496>

elements.text:

text: <@UUTL3EKN3> Oh thanks so much. Yeah, I totally understand that there is a lot of development going on. So that is fine. Looking forward to all the improvements you guys are making :slightly_smiling_face:. Thanks again for your efforts.
